Plot: Crunch Calhoun, a semi-reformed art thief, agrees to get his old gang back together to pull off one last heist.
Title: The Art of the Steal
Actors: Kurt Russell, Matt Dillon, Jay Baruchel, Kenneth Welsh
tomatoConsensus: It boasts a terrific cast led by the always-watchable Kurt Russell and Terence Stamp, but The Art of the Steal wastes its stars on a formulaic plot that borrows too obviously from superior heist pictures.
